title: Sum of Squares 1 to N

explanation.approach: Formula: n(n+1)(2n+1)/6 gives 1² + 2² + 3² + ... + n²
explanation.analogy: Like stacking squares - there's a magic formula for the total.

title: Sum of Cubes 1 to N

explanation.approach: Formula: (n(n+1)/2)² = (sum of 1 to n)²

title: Print Odd Numbers

explanation.approach: Start from 1, increment by 2 each time.
explanation.analogy: Skip every other number starting from 1.

title: Print Even Numbers

explanation.approach: Start from 2, increment by 2.
explanation.analogy: Skip every other number starting from 2.

title: Sum of Even 1 to N

explanation.approach: Add all even numbers from 2 to n.

title: Sum of Odd 1 to N

explanation.approach: Add all odd numbers from 1 to n.

title: Product of Digits

explanation.approach: Extract each digit and multiply together.

title: First Digit

explanation.approach: Keep dividing by 10 until single digit.

title: Last Digit

explanation.approach: Modulo 10 gives last digit.

title: Sum First and Last
description: Sum of first and last digit.

explanation.approach: Get last digit, then find first digit, add them.

title: Swap First and Last Digit

explanation.approach: Calculate positions, swap mathematically.

title: Remove First Digit

explanation.approach: Use modulo to remove first digit.
steps: Find power of 10 equal to first digit position

title: Remove Last Digit

explanation.approach: Integer division by 10.

title: Rotate Left Once

explanation.approach: Remove first digit, append it at end.

title: Rotate Right Once

explanation.approach: Remove last digit, prepend it at start.

title: Neon Number
description: Sum of digits of square = n.

explanation.approach: Square n, sum its digits, check if equals n.

title: Spy Number

explanation.approach: Calculate sum and product of digits, compare.

title: Automorphic Number

explanation.approach: Check if n² ends with n.
steps: Check if last digits equal n

title: Duck Number
description: Has zero but not at start.

explanation.approach: Check if 0 appears (not at start).

title: Buzz Number

explanation.approach: Check if ends in 7 OR divisible by 7.

title: Harshad Number

explanation.approach: Find digit sum, check if n divisible by it.

title: Pronic Number

explanation.approach: Check if n = k × (k+1) for some k.

title: Happy Number

explanation.approach: Keep replacing n with sum of digit squares. If reaches 1, it's happy.
steps: Replace n with sum of digit²

title: Sad Number

explanation.approach: Not a happy number - gets stuck in a cycle.

title: Abundant Number

explanation.approach: Sum proper divisors, check if > n.
